Npc0118:
ï¿½When I came to visit my friend at this hospital,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I somehow slipped and fell in the hallway.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½So now I'm staying in the hospital too.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This could be the basis for a great, tragic tearjerker.[PAUSE 20]  Well, maybe not...![HALT][END]
